Can you summarize the given material about the National Bureau of Standards (NBS) and its mission statement?: NATIONAL BUREAU OF STANDARDS (NBS):
The National Bureau of Standards (NBS), established under the authority of the U.S. Department of Commerce in 1940, is responsible for developing standards for various industries such as aviation, communication, computing, electronics, energy, food, health care, information technology, manufacturing, materials science, medicine, transportation, and more. Its primary goal is to promote technological innovation, efficiency, safety, and environmental sustainability through the development and implementation of standards.
